udpp.UDPPFunctionTranslator

This class is handling all the pipeline translations between the user level and the actual python function execution

class UDPPFunctionTranslator.IterableQueue(source_queue)

simple queue pyrhon iterator, which allows iteration and insertion of new items during iteration

class UDPPFunctionTranslator.UDPPFunctionTranslator

This class is handling all the pipeline translations between the user level and the actual python function execution

static create_calltree_graph(_pipelines: dict, _export_graph_plots: str | None = None) → DiGraph

parses the user defined stages into a directed grap in order to determ the order of computation for each function.

Parameters:

_pipelines (dict) – pipeline stages directly parsed from the yaml

Returns:

returns a directed graph with edges

Return type:

nx.DiGraph

static create_sub_calltrees(_pipelines: dict, _calltree_graph: ~networkx.classes.digraph.DiGraph, _start_steps: [<class 'str'>], _export_graph_plots: str | None = None) → [<class 'networkx.classes.digraph.DiGraph'>]

parses the user defined stages into a directed grap in order to determ the order of computation for each function.

Parameters:

  • _pipelines (nx.DiGraph) – pipeline stages directly parsed from the yaml

  • _calltree_graph – the complete calltree graph from create_calltree_graph()

  • _start_steps ([str]) – computed start stages from get_startsteps()

  • _export_graph_plots ([str]) – if set to a folder path, the calculated graphs will be exported as image also

Returns:

a list of all generated sub call trees in the order of right execution stages

Return type:

[nx.DiGraph]

static extract_pipelines_steps(_pipeline: dict) → dict

returns all stage <name> entries from the parsed yaml dict

Parameters:

_pipelines (dict) – pipeline stages (directly parsed from yaml)

Returns:

all stages a dict using stage name as key

Return type:

dict

static get_parameter_from_step(_pipelines: dict, _step: str, _only_step_dependencies: bool = False) → [<class 'str'>]

renders an image of a given nx.Graph for debug purposes

Parameters:

  • _pipelines (nx.DiGraph) – graph to render

  • _step (str) – export folder of the rendered graph png file

  • _only_step_dependencies (str) – if true only stage input parameters a returned

Returns:

returns the input parameters of a given pipeline stage

Return type:

[str]

static get_startsteps(_pipelines: dict) → [<class 'str'>]

returns all possible start stages with no input parameter dependencies from other stages, e.g. import_reading functions

Parameters:

_pipelines (dict) – pipeline stages (directly parsed from yaml)

Returns:

list of start stages names

Return type:

[str]

static listfunctions() → dict

returns all functions implemented in the UDPPFFunctionCollection.py using the inspect function for live reflection

Returns:

implemented functions as dict with function name as key

Return type:

dict

static load_pipelines(_folder: str) → dict

load all found yaml pipeline files into a dict but only pipelines with the settings entry enabled set to true. so it’s possible to enable and disable pipelines during pipeline run command execution

Parameters:

_folder (str) – folder with

Returns:

all enabled pipelines as parsed yaml dict

Return type:

dict

static plot_graph(graph: DiGraph, _export_graph_plots: str | None = None, _filename: str = 'graphplot', _title: str = 'graph_plot')

renders an image of a given nx.Graph for debug purposes

Parameters:

  • graph (nx.DiGraph) – graph to render

  • _export_graph_plots (str) – export folder of the rendered graph png file

  • _filename (str) – filename

  • _title (str) – headline of the render backed into the image

static strip_function_parameter_types(_typestr: str) → str

simplifies the python object typestring for function parameters e.g.: [<class MRPReading>] => list(MRPReading)

Parameters:

_typestr (str) – input from inspect.getfullargspec(function_obj) for a given function as string

Returns:

returns more human readable name of the type

Return type:

str
